content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Abdel Fattah el-Sisi

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, the sixth and current president of the Arab Republic of Egypt since 8 June 2014.
Summary
The number of visits per country where President  el-Sisi traveled are:
* One visit to Angola, Armenia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Brazil, Chad, Denmark, Djibouti, Gabon, Guinea, the Holy See, Indonesia, Ireland, Ivory Coast, Kazakhstan, Mozambique, Niger, Norway, Portugal, Romania, Senegal, Serbia, Singapore, South Korea, Switzerland, Tanzania, Turkey, Uzbekistan, Vietnam and Zambia
* Two visits to Algeria, Cyprus, Hungary, Italy, Kenya, Oman, Rwanda, Spain, Uganda and the United Kingdom
* Three visits Equatorial Guinea, Iraq, Japan and Qatar
* Four visits to Bahrain, Greece and India
* Five visits to Kuwait
* Six visits to Ethiopia, Germany, Russia and Sudan
* Seven visits to China and Jordan
* Eight visits to France
* Nine visits to the United States
* Twelve visits to the United Arab Emirates
* Fifteen visits to Saudi Arabia
